name: amp-tube
description: A simple YouTube search engine and viewer app, implemented in AMP

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && node build/build.js > dist/manifest.webmanifest && imagemin src/*.{webp,png,svg} --out-dir=dist && html-minifier --collapse-boolean-attributes --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace --collapse-whitespace --minify-css --custom-attr-collapse /on/ --remove-attribute-quotes --process-scripts application/json --sort-attributes --sort-class-name --minify-urls -o dist/index.html src/index.html

author: Thomas Steiner <steiner.thomas@gmail.com> (http://blog.tomayac.com/)
